snippet: Reports of killings and even beheadings were beginning to circulate, worsening what is already a longstanding humanitarian nightmare for the 18,000 residents of the Yarmouk refugee camp.
abstract: Islamic State militants reportedly seize most of Palestinian refugee camp in southern part of Damascus, Syria, marking extremist group's greatest foray yet into that city.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: Reports of killings and even beheadings were beginning to circulate, worsening what is already a longstanding humanitarian nightmare for the 18,000 residents of the Yarmouk refugee camp.

headline.main: Islamic State Seizes Palestinian Refugee Camp in Syria
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Seizes Palestinian Refugee Camp in Syria

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
